name: mapit I/O
description:
This plugin adds the mapit I/O features to CloudCompare. You have to create and open the mapit-cloudcompare file (*.cc-mapit). Which has to have the following setup:

--workspace # identifier for next line
ws # the workspace to open
--files # identifier for next lines
/input/ # this must can be read as .*/input/.*
/other-input/ # other data .*/other-input/.*

The supported entity types are:
  • Pointclouds
